body:
In whatever environment you are in the end, there are python packages missing.

You do a few weird things because of permissions issues i guess. To avoid this you should use virtualenv - you already did a few things regarding that, but this looks incomplete.

Oscar shows you how to set up a virtualenv properly for their sample project. And you might want to read here on virtualenv to get a better understanding of it.

  • virtualenv guide
  • How to use virtualenv with Python?
  • Comprehensive beginner's virtualenv tutorial?
title: Python Django Oscar Run Issue
